page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {EMPLOYMENT}The school leaving age is sixteen.About 75% leave,the rest staying for higher education.Men retire at 65 and women at 60 years of age.Every working person pays a weekly contribution from their wages towards a Retirement Pension.Our surveys show that only 13 parents work in Coggeshall and 50 work outside Coggeshall, mainly in Chelmsford, Colchester and Braintree.A few work in London.Our survey of part_time employment inside and outside Coggeshall shows that 13 parents work part_time in Coggeshall and 8 parents work part_time outside.Most women work part_time becouse they have to look after the house as well.There is also seasonal work on the land like fruit picking,mainly strawberry,raspberry and corn on the cob.Some chidren of 13 do a paper round to earn pocket money.
